title: Domestic teams with the most players at the 2018 World Cup
summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of players in the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
There is a difference of 7.0 between the maximum Team Manchester City and minimum Team Atlético Madrid.
min_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of players in each Team on the y axis.
The Number of players is appeared to be the highest at Team Manchester City and lowest at Team Atlético Madrid.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Team in the x axis and Number of players in the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
There is a difference of 7.0 between the maximum Team Manchester City and minimum Team Atlético Madrid.
max_summary: This bar chart has 12 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Number of players in each Team on the y axis.
The maximum Number of players 16.0 is found at Team Manchester City and the minimum is found at Atlético Madrid where Team is 9.0.
The highest Team Manchester City has 7.0 more Number of players than the lowest Team Atlético Madrid.
Team Manchester City is higher than any other Teams with value 16.0, followed by Real Madrid, and FC Barcelona. Down to Team Atlético Madrid with the lowest value 9.0.
Team Tottenham Hotspur, FC Paris Saint-Germain, and Chelsea FC share the same value 12.0.
The Team Atlético Madrid tends to be 1.36 percent lower than average.
The Number of players is 141.0 if we add up values of all Teams.
